alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:10AM EST until February 23 at 2:36AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Due to recent heavy rains, the river will continue to rise, reaching a crest of 381.7 feet Sunday evening. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 382.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 373.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
